q: Judge Louis Walsh confirmed both Simon Cowell and Cheryl Cole have quit the show in favour of working on the American version, leaving a spot free for Sharon Osbourne . Louis Walsh hinted to the News Of The World: It will be me and Dannii Minogue with two more people. Sharon Osbourne and Dannii Minogue first fell out when they both starred in the show in 2007, with Dannii Minogue later claiming she had been bullied. A source said: X Factor is very much under way. The dates are all pencilled in, even if the stars aren't. Simon Cowell won't be rushed.'' Here is a partial transcript of the chat between Colin Powell and CNN's Candy Crowley : CROWLEY: We are entering a presidential campaign season. Do you see anyone currently in the Republican field that would prompt you to vote Republican in 2012 and not vote for the re-election of Barack Obama ? Anybody interest you in the Republican field? long supported the Tunisian leader, seeing him as a bulwark against Islamic militants in the region. In 2006, then-US defence secretary Donald Rumsfeld , speaking in Tunis, praised the country's evolution. What they have done it seems to me is move from a colony in 50 years- a relatively short period of time- to a democratic country that in different areas is moving at a different pace, he said. The US administration, like France and the European Union, never called for Zine El Abidine Ben Ali to go. Indeed, on January 12- just two days before he fled- State Department

administration, possibly replacing Robert Gates as defense secretary, Colin Powell said he is not interested in a government role. He said he wants to remain in private life although he is happy to be an informal presidential adviser. The administration knows that I am quite content with the work I am doing now, he said. ''I am not interested in a government job.'' Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded John McCain Rep.
